overview: A renowned criminal who has been committing crime from a young age after being put to work on the streets by his wicked uncle unearths shocking secrets from his familyâ€™s past when he attempts to change his ways. Starring Daniel K. Daniel, Destiny Etiko, Odinaka Mbadiugha, Ifeanyi Azodo, Chika Anyanwu and Obi Okoli.
title: Saved By Love
